This is the home page for the documentation of the `heparansulfate` Java package. 

This project implements the mathematical models and optimization methods described in the 2016 *Scientific Reports* [publication](https://www.nature.com/articles/srep24829){target="_blank"}:

> **"Combining measurements to estimate properties and characterization extent of complex biochemical mixtures; applications to Heparan Sulfate."**

### Available documents
* **[Technical Overview](overview.html):** A detailed breakdown of the model hierarchy (H&I, H&C, N&I, MaxEnt) and the Java class architecture.
* **[Figure Examples](figure_examples.html):** RMarkdown examples demonstrating how to call the Java computational engine to recreate the paper's figures.
* **[API Javadoc](api/index.html):** Direct technical documentation for the Java source code.
